id_tbl_create_sql: id integer, name text, desc text, local text, latitude real, longitude real, primary key(id)
ch_tbl_create_sql: id integer, ch integer, type text, name text, desc text, unit text, primary key(id, ch)
dp_tbl_create_sql: id integer ,ch integer, ts datetime, val text, primary key(id, ch, ts)
